name: Lemon Tree Hotel, Chandigarh

reviews.text: We had booked 4 rooms for our group for 1 night of 25 Dec 2012. All rooms were allotted on the same floor. As our rooms were on the 1st floor, nothing much to write about view surroundings.
reviews.title: Best Value for Money

reviews.text: As we had stayed in a pathetic hotel for 2 previous nights in McLeodganj / Dharamshala (HP), it was a BIG relief for all of us to step into our rooms. With a lot better bathrooms than those in our previous hotel, a quick shower was most refreshing.
reviews.title: Excellet Value for Money

reviews.text: We then headed to their restaurant - CItrus for dinner. Buffet spread was a nice sight with a mix of North Indian, Chinese and continental fare. Food quality too was fairly good. Breakfast next morning too was a regular fare but again, a wide selection from South Indian, North Indian and Western.
reviews.title: Unpleasant Experience - Will Never Stay Here Again

reviews.text: As for room interior and sleep quality, both were upto the mark with no complaints whatsoever.
reviews.title: Good for a short stay

reviews.text: Overall, a nice experience and I will surely look forward to staying at a LemonTree hotel during my next local travel. Keep up the good job, guys!
reviews.title: Luxury stay in budget hotel

reviews.text: Very nice experience at the newly built hotel in Chandigarh , good food, nice staff , excellent ambiance in restaurant and smiley staff, i will not forget in restaurant warm welcome done by Mr. Ajay friendly nature guy.. suggest me mouth-buttering dishes...and also help me about local area knowledge. Free pool table another plus point of this hotel , while having drinks in their bar. Room bed comfortable.. nice clean.. all over excellent stay , if i would come again Chandigarh , i will prefer this hotel only ..Thanks Lemon Tree for a great Hospitality Service.. Once again thanks to Mr. Ajay ... hats of u ... keep it up .
reviews.title: " SUPERB HOTEL "

reviews.text: Excellent hotel, well trained staff and a very calm and peaceful environment. The rooms are good and well maintained. The rates are competitive for the facilities available. Cuisines are good and the bar is well stocked. Overall, a very good hotel to stay...
reviews.title: Best Hotels of Chandigarh

reviews.text: I spent 2 nights at Lemon Tree Hotel in Chandigarh with my family and overall it was nice experience. The hotel is very good and a nice place for hangout. The rooms were really nice and spacy. The breakfast buffet was really nice. My family really loved this place. The hotel is very close to the airport but slightly out of the city. The higher floor rooms will give you the best view of chandigarh city. Th staff was really nice and the service was quick and good. We really had a very good time and enjoyed a lot.
reviews.title: Nice place

reviews.text: Clean rooms, good service and great food too... The hotel is close to the airport, but slightly cut off from the main city.
reviews.title: Good!

reviews.text: Overall, a good hotel to stay at. Will definitely recommend staying here....
reviews.title: Good, efficient business hotel

reviews.text: I booked thru makemytrip and got a good rate for this hotel. For a business person, it is a value for money hotel. The hotel is overall good, although there is no centralised heating which I expected in December in Chandigarh. Hotel did not provide any room heater on day 1 inspite of reminders. On day 2 , i got a room heater and thereafter the room was comfortable.
reviews.title: Good value for money business hotel

reviews.text: a hotel with an overall excellent experience! Great for business travel, good food, 24 hours gym, great service & courteous staff... a must must try hotel for all...... has a great feel to the place....
reviews.title: perfect for a business travel

reviews.text: Average Stay though very Good Front Office and F&B Service Staff. Compact room size, Avg. Food, Extra Ordinary Front Desk staff. Challenge is value for money/ Food / Location. Only the rooms are a bit smaller and too cold, central heating didn't worked in my room. The only thing which was a little different is - you have to take lift for check in as the reception is not on the ground floor and hence away from entrance.
reviews.title: Good Hotel for only business trip...

reviews.text: Avg. Stay though very Good Front Office and F&B Service Staff. Compact room size, Avg. Food, Very Good room service staff. Extra Ordinary Front Desk staff. Challenge is value for money/ Food / Location.
reviews.title: Avg.

reviews.text: The hotel is a nice small business hotel. Location is not good in a sense that its away from the main market and places to go around but it is closer to airport and train station. Clean and very professional young staff. Food was very good. Only the rooms are a bit smaller and too cold, central heating didn't worked in my room. Bathing water is not too hot in the evenign but became okay in the morning.
reviews.title: Lemon Tree chandigarh

reviews.text: It was a good stay at this hotel. The staff is very cooperative and well mannerred. Service in all lemon tree hotels is good (i have been to two more properties) and this was not an exception. this is located in industrial area but that does not affect the ambience / atmosphere inside. The only thing which was a little different is - you have to take lift for check in as the reception is not on the ground floor and hence away from entrance.
reviews.title: courteous staff, excellent service

reviews.text: This hotel is in industrial area but within reach from city. We got it at best rate from Make My Trip. Check in process is fast except, no offering of wel come drink from staff. Front office staff is very helpful. House keeping service is prompt, but there is no supervision from housekeeping head after room making. There is no toilet paper roll and only 1 bath and hand towel is provided though we are 2 adults and 1 children stayed.
reviews.title: Value For Money Hotel

reviews.text: In room dining service is god but quantity is too less. The worst area of department is F & B service in restaurant. Price for buffe dinner has been told to us is Rs. 250/- but they charged us Rs.450/ per person excl. taxes and no way that buffe was worth Rs 450/ as there was neither live counter nor a single snacks item. Most of the time we found sheffing dishes empty and staff used to serve us only on request. Breakfast buffe spread is good, but here also we need to wait some time for replenishment. No doubt quality of food is good. Mocktail served also was saur crushed ice water with no garnishing or presentation for Rs. 269/-.
reviews.title: All good .

reviews.text: All the things were good but you people have to improve your food .
reviews.title: Good and Comfortable Stay!!

reviews.text: Quality of the food was gud but the food was tasteless.... Rest all was nice.
reviews.title: Good hotel in a bad location

description: Located in Industrial Area Phase I, the hotel is in proximity to Chandigarh’s business hubs.
